titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for restraint of the transportation of corne
Proclamations. 1621-09-16
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Theobalds, the sixteenth day of September, in the nineteenth yeere of our reigne ..
In this edition the last complete line of text ends: will.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
